projects.name: Hospital pharmacy system
projects.description: A modern web-based solution for managing hospital operations efficiently. Built with Laravel (PHP) for the backend and React + ShadCN UI for the frontend, it supports features like ward management, dark mode, and responsive design.

projects.name: SOM Shop Redesign
projects.description: A simple React + Vite app to browse and filter products from SOM

projects.name: My Portfolio
projects.description: A simple and clean personal portfolio built with Next.js, featuring your introduction, professional history, and contact information. Itâ€™s designed for quick customization and deployment.

projects.name: LangSwap
projects.description: A language exchange platform that pairs learners with native speakers for real-time practice, combining Omegle-style random matching with Duolingo-style exercises. Built with NestJS and REST APIs.
